QuestData.Title: Sludge Beast!
QuestData.Description: Whatever is lurking around the Sludge Fen, it doesn't appear to be human. Judging from the remains around its tracks, it's also dangerous.$B$BYou decide to follow the tracks down to the bottom of the lake and look for the creature's resting place.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the Sludge Beast's resting place and kill whatever comes out.
QuestData.CompletionText: So? Did you see what's going on at the Sludge Fen?
QuestData.RewardText: You saw sludge being dumped straight into the lake? I wouldn't be surprised if the Sludge Beast were a product of the Venture Co.'s carelessness.
